channel.title: Alpine on AtlasCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Alpine on AtlasCloud

item.title: Intro to using AtlasCloud Alpine package repo
item.description: Intro to using AtlasCloud Alpine package repo Install gpg key curl -o /etc/apk/keys/packages@atlascloud.xyz-5c7e1f40.rsa.pub packages.atlascloud.xyz/atlascloud/alpine/packages@atlascloud.xyz-5c7e1f40.rsa.pub add repo echo https://packages.atlascloud.xyz/atlascloud/alpine/3.12/main >> /etc/apk/repositories update apk update install stuff apk add linux-vanilla-atlas $ echo profit
